pr_title: [877] Updated multi-tenancy privacy to check onchain groups.

timeline.message:
[877] Updated multi-tenancy privacy to check onchain groups.

Signed-off-by: Mark Terry <mark.terry@consensys.net>

timeline.bodyText: Need to review whether these checks should be in this class at all.
timeline.author: mark-terry
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -515,4 +516,22 @@ public void verifyPrivacyGroupContainsEnclavePublicKey(
       final String privacyGroupId, final String enclavePublicKey) {

timeline.bodyText: would be good to have some unit tests for this class
timeline.author: macfarla

timeline.bodyText: should these signatures just be in this class?
timeline.author: macfarla
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,115 @@

+
